subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari and Landry Fields made consecutive 3-pointers, and the New York Knicks took advantage of LeBron James’s miserable shooting night to beat the Miami Heat on Thursday night.
snippet: Danilo Gallinari and Landry Fields made consecutive 3-pointers, and the New York Knicks took advantage of LeBron James’s miserable shooting night to beat the Miami Heat on Thursday night.
